Evidence.description: Evidence is the evidence that a finality provider has signed finality signatures with correct public randomness on two conflicting Babylon headers

canonical_finality_sig.description: Finality signature to the canonical block, where finality signature is an EOTS signature, i.e., the `s` in a Schnorr signature `(r, s)`. `r` is the public randomness already committed by the finality provider. Deserializes to `SchnorrEOTSSig`

fork_finality_sig.description: Finality signature to the fork block, where finality signature is an EOTS signature. Deserializes to `SchnorrEOTSSig`

fp_btc_pk.description: BTC PK of the finality provider that casts this vote

pub_rand.description: Public randomness the finality provider has committed to. Deserializes to `SchnorrPubRand`

signing_context.description: Context in which the finality signatures were used. It must be hex encoded 32 bytes, of the sha256 hash of the context string
